definition: To sell all available items or goods, often referring to a situation where a store or business has no more stock left to sell. This term is commonly used in the context of retail or commerce.

examples.german: Die Tickets f√ºr das Konzert sind ausverkauft.
examples.english: The tickets for the concert are sold out.

examples.german: Der Laden hat alle Produkte ausverkauft.
examples.english: The store has sold out all products.

examples.german: Das Buch wurde innerhalb weniger Tage ausverkauft.
examples.english: The book sold out within a few days.

examples.german: Die limitierte Edition ist bereits ausverkauft.
examples.english: The limited edition is already sold out.
